message:
I've been thinking about this idea for a while now. I think that there's chance out there for an alternative for all these cloud service solutions. One that provide users with Privacy, Freedom and offer a bigger chance for software vendors to compete.
http://www.amreldib.com/2012/09/personal-clouds.html
